title: 朋友进不去，后台显示lost connection: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.cod...
author: 小李e飞刀
txt_content:
lost connection: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: The received string length is longer than maximum allowed (17 > 16)
求大佬帮助

replies.author: SakuraTao
replies.txt_content:
小李e飞刀 发表于 2020-4-30 17:54
前面ip隐藏了
名字过长了
缩小到16个字母以内

replies.author: 小李e飞刀
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-4-30 17:53
玩家的名字过长
谢谢大佬

replies.author: 小李e飞刀
replies.txt_content:
